Push-ups target the chest, triceps, and shoulders. Keep your core tight.
Pull-ups work the lats, biceps, and upper back. Use proper grip strength.
Planks improve core stability and posture. Engage your abs throughout.
Squats strengthen the legs and glutes. Maintain proper form.
Rest days are essential for muscle recovery and growth.
Calisthenics improves strength, flexibility, and endurance without weights.
To lose weight, maintain a calorie deficit through diet and exercise.
HIIT workouts increase calorie burn and boost cardiovascular health.
Stretching before and after workouts prevents injuries and improves flexibility.
Hydration is key for optimal performance and recovery.
